H0.text: Which Verdi opera is based on La Dame aux Camellias by Alexandre Dumas fils. La Traviata

H1.text: Which Verdi opera is based on La Dame aux Camellias by Alexandre Dumas fils. Rigoletto

H2.text: Which Verdi opera is based on La Dame aux Camellias by Alexandre Dumas fils. Aida

H3.text: Which Verdi opera is based on La Dame aux Camellias by Alexandre Dumas fils. È Strano

A4.text: It is based on La Dame aux camélias (1852), a play by Alexandre Dumas fils, which he adapted from his own 1848 novel.

A5.text: As a result of this, Verdi's biographer Mary Jane Phillips-Matz reports, the composer immediately began to compose music for what would later become La traviata.
